description.narrative: Uganda’s country program will be delivered through 3 pathways; Pathway A on Indigenous Peoples and Local Communities (which seeks to protect them against large developments and build their capacity to question and demand for their rights), Pathway B on Drivers of deforestation and forest degradation (that seeks to halt exploitation, infrastructure development and expansion of agro-commodities that are considered main drivers of deforestation and forest degradation) and Pathway C on Civic Spaces (that seeks to use environment and human rights defenders to open engagement spaces for positive engagement). The specific problems that will be addressed by the program include: Challenges to indigenous communities resulting from (a) the lack of power and opportunities to govern and manage their landscape, limited involvement in decision making processes and (b) emerging pressure on their land and forests through external drivers.

title.narrative: SCS5 # of CSOs with increased L&A capacities

description.narrative: This result shows the CSOs working in GLA with increased L&A capacities

title.narrative: # of CSOs which are both women and youth led with increased L&A capacities

description.narrative: Measures the number of 1st and 2nd ring partner that are led by both women and youth and have inreased L&A capacities

comment.narrative: At the beginning of the GLA2 programme no CSO has yet increased L&A capcities as a result of the programme.

No 1st ring 'women and youth led' CSO partners are expected to increase their capacity over the course of the GLA2 programme in Uganda. No 2nd ring 'women and youth led' CSO partners have been included in this target value, as the GLA is a flexible adaptable program this can't be well estimated in advance.
NA

title.narrative: # of CSOs (not youth or women led) with increased L&A capacities

description.narrative: Measures the number of 1st and 2nd ring partner that are not specifically led by women or youth and have inreased L&A capacities

comment.narrative: At the beginning of the GLA2 programme no CSO has yet increased L&A capcities as a result of the programme.

These are 1st ring 'not youth not women led' CSO partners that are expected to increase their capacity over the course of the GLA2 programme in Uganda. No 2nd ring 'not youth not women led' CSO partners have been included in this target value, as the GLA is a flexible adaptable program this can't be well estimated in advance.

Seven 2nd ring partners strenghtened in "Knowledge and skills to use different advocacy techniques, also in a changing environment" among other capacities. The 2nd ring partners have been entered under SCS053 by default as not sure whether women or youth led.

title.narrative: # of women led CSOs with increased L&A capacities

description.narrative: Measures the number of 1st and 2nd ring partners that are led by women and have increased L&A capacities

comment.narrative: At the beginning of the GLA2 programme no CSO has yet increased L&A capcities as a result of the programme.

These are 1st ring women led CSO partners that are expected to increase their capacity over the course of the GLA2 programme in Uganda. No 2nd ring women led CSO partners have been included in this target value, as the GLA is a flexible adaptable program this can't be well estimated in advance.
One 1st ring CSO increased capacity on "Knowledge and skills to use different advocacy techniques, also in a changing environment" among other capacities.

title.narrative: # of youth led CSOs with increased L&A capacities

description.narrative: Measures the number of 1st and 2nd ring partners that are led by youth and have increased L&A capacities

comment.narrative: At the beginning of the GLA2 programme no CSO has yet increased L&A capcities as a result of the programme.

No 1st ring youth led CSO partners are expected to increase their capacity over the course of the GLA2 programme in Uganda. No 2nd ring youth led CSO partners have been included in this target value, as the GLA is a flexible adaptable program this can't be well estimated in advance.
NA

title.narrative: # of by-laws for sustainable and inclusive development that are better implemented as a result of CSO engagement

description.narrative: Measures the number of by-laws that are better implemented as a result of GLA efforts

comment.narrative: At the beginning of the GLA2 programme no by-laws have been better implemented for sustainable and inclusive development as a result of CSO engagement

The target of the GLA2 programme is to better implement 3 by-laws for sustainable and inclusive development as a result of CSO engagement, specifically focusing on the oil and gas, agriculture and forestry sectors.
